thread.title: 32 things Donald Trump “loves” just in time for Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: 32 things Donald Trump “loves” just in time for Valentine’s Day – VICE News

author: Zeke Spector
title: 32 things Donald Trump “loves” just in time for Valentine’s Day
text:
32 things Donald Trump “loves” just in time for Valentine’s Day By Zeke Spector on Feb 14, 2017 Valentine’s Day gives us an occasion to focus on the great loves of our life. For most of us, this means our significant others, family, and friends. But for President Donald Trump, this includes a long list of people, places, activities, and inanimate objects.
While many of Trump’s loves seem logical, there are also some more eyebrow-raising things receiving the president’s affections, such as “fighting with banks,” “open markets,” and “war.”
Watch the above video for a semi-comprehensive list of things the romancer-in-chief “loves.” Don’t worry, lonely hearts, you’re in there too (as long as you’re part of “everything”).
